name: es-checker
description: A feature detection library for ECMAScript in node.js and browser

scripts.build: browserify public\assets\origin.js -o es-checker.js && copy es-checker.js public\ && browserify public\assets\mapper.origin.js -o public\assets\mapper.js && copy public dist
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run pages && rm -rf dist

author: Ruan Yifeng
